description: Stores the 'wallet passes' generated by the chat assistant and the analytics engine.

user_id.description: A reference to the user who owns this pass.

title.description: The main title of the pass.

details.description: A flexible field to store the specific details of the pass.

valid_until.description: For passes that expire, like a shopping list.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the pass was created.
